column4: im trying to mount an NTFS partition, but i get 'Failed to mount '/dev/sda1': Operation not supported
Mount is denied because NTFS is marked to be in use.' what can i do ?
Shows us the output of the df -T command
there's no entry for sda, which is the one i need to access
Can you put the output of fdisl -l /dev/sda in the pastebin?
the output of fdisk -l  /dev/sda is "Cannot open /dev/sda"
try "sudo mount -t ntfs-3g /dev/sda1 /mnt" and paste any output in  the pastebin
so i guess i have to start and stop the windows partition...
OK try to repair rhe volume from Windows and try again
many thanks for the help! i'll try it
Or if you do not have Windows try Choice 2 but be warned!
